rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Domine exaudi orationem meam et clamor meus ad te
perveniat veniat perveniet quia non
spernis spernit deus preces pauperum

vBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd

verses.vBody: De profundis clamavi ad te domine domine exaudi vocem meam
In quacumque die invocavero te velociter exaudi me
Ne avertas faciem tuam a me in quacumque die tribulor inclina ad me aurem tuam

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
